input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='MAAP Team Evo Thermal Cargo Bib Tights'
  - Name='MAAP Women's Team Evo Bib Shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Long Cycling Bib Shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Women's Aerate Team Evo Cargo Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Maap Men's Team Bib Evo'
  - Name='Women's MAAP Team Bib Evo Cargo'
  - Name='Maap Men's Training Bib'
  - Name='Maap Men's Training Bib 2.0 Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Maap World Tour Team Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Bib shorts MAAP Team Evo Cargo'
  - Name='MAAP Alt_Road Cargo 2.0 Bib shorts'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Training Bib 3.0'
  - Name='MAAP Sequence Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Maap Team Bib Evo'
  - Name='Rapha Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Unlimited Cargo Bibshort'
  - Name='Sportful Snap Set'
  - Name='Sportful RED BULL-BORA-hansgrohe Fiandre 2024 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Nove Colli Italy Italia Sportful Rare Cycling Bib Shorts Size Xl'
  - Name='Sportful Women's Neo W Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Men's Sportful Snap Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set'
  - Name='Sportful Women's Cycling Bibshorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha RCC Flyweight Bib Short'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon WRX Shell Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Team Evo Thermal Cargo Bib Tights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal cargo bib tights share the bib construction and cycling focus but are for cooler conditions and have cargo features, less versatile than the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Women's Team Evo Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A women's bib shorts product matching the bib shorts form, construction, and cycling purpose, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Team Bib Evo Long Cycling Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long cycling bib shorts share the key construction and cycling usage but differ in length and possibly materials, slightly less versatile than the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Women's Aerate Team Evo Cargo Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cargo bib shorts share bib shorts silhouette and cycling intent but add cargo and specific venting, moderately close in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maap Men's Team Bib Evo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's team bib shorts closely match on bib design and cycling use, very similar product type and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's MAAP Team Bib Evo Cargo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's bib shorts with cargo elements are relevant but cargo and gender specifics reduce score slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maap Men's Training Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Training bib shorts are very similar to performance bib shorts in construction and usage, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maap Men's Training Bib 2.0 Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Updated training bib cycling shorts retain the core features and purpose, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maap World Tour Team Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: World Tour bib shorts have a close match in performance cycling bib shorts category, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bib shorts MAAP Team Evo Cargo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cargo bib shorts share bib construction but cargo element introduces slight difference, still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Alt_Road Cargo 2.0 Bib shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cargo bib shorts geared for alternate road use share basic bib shorts structure but cargo feature slightly impacts general versatility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Training Bib 3.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Latest version training bib shorts are very similar in function and construction to reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Sequence Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular cycling shorts (non-bib) are less comparable due to absence of bib straps despite similar cycling shorts function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maap Team Bib Evo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core team bib shorts, closely aligned with the reference bib shorts type and cycling suitability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling bib shorts from Rapha share top-tier bib shorts feature set, function, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Unlimited Cargo Bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cargo bibshort with bib construction is relevant but cargo aspect introduces some divergence from classic bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Snap Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A jersey and shorts set including shorts which may or may not be bib shorts; unclear and less specifically relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful RED BULL-BORA-hansgrohe Fiandre 2024 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Professional bib shorts closely aligned in features, construction, and usage with the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nove Colli Italy Italia Sportful Rare Cycling Bib Shorts Size Xl
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance cycling bib shorts very similar in design and function to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Women's Neo W Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cycling bib shorts with similar structure and intended use, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Sportful Snap Cycling Jersey + Shorts Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes shorts alongside jersey but shorts are not specified as bib shorts, reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Women's Cycling Bibshorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's cycling bib shorts matching core features and construction of the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality men's bib shorts sharing all major product attributes with the reference bib shorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha RCC Flyweight Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lightweight bib shorts for performance cycling, relevant though lighter construction might differ slightly in durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon WRX Shell Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shell shorts are typically more protective outer layers, less similar in construction and primary use than bib shorts.
